jade.core.security.authentication
Class JADEUserAuthenticatorImpl

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.security.authentication.JADEUserAuthenticatorImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
JADEUserAuthenticator
public class JADEUserAuthenticatorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JADEUserAuthenticator

JADEUserAuthenticatorImpl is the entity that takes as input a couple: username/password and provides: - the JADEPrincipal associated (if present, also with SDSIName) - and Credentials (if any) owned by that user at start-up time.
